scenes.background: Monica and Bob review your feedback. Monica looks relieved, but Bob still seems concerned.
scenes.description: 'Thanks for the feedback. Can you stay on call in case we need more help?'

options.text: I can stay on call for a bit longer. Let's get this sorted out.
options.analysis: You showed a willingness to continue helping, demonstrating strong empathy and social skills, but your self-regulation was lower.

options.text: I'm sorry, but I need to log off now. I trust you can handle it from here.
options.analysis: You maintained your boundaries, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: I can stay on call for a few more minutes, but I'll need to log off soon.
options.analysis: You offered partial help, showing balanced empathy and social skills, but your motivation and self-regulation were not particularly high.
